## `SortGraph`

Sorts the bars in the specified bar chart.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SortGraph(GraphType graphType,
          SortOrder order)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|[`GraphType`](#graphtype) graphType | The bar chart to sort. | 
|[`SortOrder`](#sortorder) order | How the bars should be sorted. |
